Key Match Events: Carlos Rodon gave the Yankees six strong innings
Joey Cantillo unleashed two wild pitches that scored runs in the bottom of the third inning
Luke Weaver picked up his fourth save and got out of a mess in the eighth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Anthony Rizzo on Rodon's winning performance: 'He set the tone.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees had 7 walks in Game 1 of the ALCS, after 27 free passes in the ALDS against the Royals
